function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Usage of high integrity serial bus protocol (CAN) may lead to potential data breaches or security vulnerabilities.","Impact":"Compromised data integrity and privacy, potential for unauthorized access to IAQ data.","Mitigation":"Use encryption and authentication protocols to secure the CAN network, regularly update security measures to prevent data breaches.","Technologies":"Encryption algorithms, authentication protocols, security patches and updates.","People":"Researchers, system administrators, and stakeholders involved in IAQ monitoring.","Owner":"Research team, IT security professionals, and system administrators."},{"Description":"Utilization of low-cost micro gas sensors and Arduino microcontroller may result in inaccurate IAQ monitoring and data quality issues.","Impact":"Inaccurate IAQ readings, unreliable data for decision-making, potential health risks due to false information.","Mitigation":"Calibrate and validate the sensor data regularly, employ redundancy and data validation techniques to cross-verify sensor readings.","Technologies":"Calibration algorithms, redundancy techniques, data validation methods.","People":"Researchers, data analysts, and stakeholders relying on IAQ data.","Owner":"Research team, data analysts, and stakeholders relying on IAQ data."},{"Description":"Reliance on wireless communication using ZigBee module may introduce interference and communication disruptions in IAQ monitoring system.","Impact":"Data loss, delay in real-time monitoring, and missed critical IAQ events, potentially compromising the effectiveness of the monitoring system.","Mitigation":"Implement frequency hopping and signal strength optimization to minimize interference, conduct thorough site survey for optimal network placement.","Technologies":"Frequency hopping algorithms, signal strength optimization, site survey tools.","People":"Researchers, network engineers, and stakeholders relying on real-time IAQ data.","Owner":"Research team, network engineers, and system administrators."}]}
